Text: i instal game. dont update it. when i want to active it i run keygene and copy [.number.] to spot where it ask serial key. it dosnt work. what do i do wrong?
oh nvm i had to active it in offline mode lol

Manual: Use MB_KeyGen.exe  (TRiViUM folder on DVD). Instruction in Pictures: 4Dummies.png (TRiViUM folder on DVD) 1. Run the MB_KeyGen.exe  and press the Get Num 2. Copy the resulting number in the window of activation StarForcern 3. Click I already have an activation key 4. Copy your Hardware ID in the keygen 5. Click Get Key in keygen 6. Copy the resulting key in the box and click Next StarForce 7. Play!
